sentence.Network_en: In fact, I found him personally likable, if irresponsibly impulsive.
sentence.Network_cn: 说实在的, 我发现,这个人还很可爱, 虽然有些不负责任地过于任性了.

list.abs: besides , she has a likable character with good sense of humor . although she is usually described as " boyish " , I think she actually is a sensitive person .另外，也有著很可爱的性格与幽默感，虽然经常被形容为男孩子气，不过我觉得她其实是个颇敏感的人。
he's a likable cuss .他是个可爱的人.
with a very nice blend of fantasy and reality , and two very likable stars , " Roman Holiday " is both entertaining and thoughtful .随着一个幻想与现实结合非常好，和两个非常可爱的明星，“罗马假日”，既是娱乐，周到。
in these cases , you can actually put yourself into a more likable mood by assuming more likable body language .在这些情况下，你可以通过做出些可爱的肢体语言，来使自己看上去心情更加愉快。

means.word_mean: 1. (of characters in literature or drama) evoking empathic or sympathetic feelings;
